subject: AI & Agents
title: Data Validation: Catch Problems Early
description: A short lesson to help you apply Data Validation: Catch Problems Early.

hook.text: A pipeline runs for 8 hours, then fails because a column changed from int to string.

buildup.text: Data validation checks schemas, distributions, and business rules before training starts.

discovery.text: Great Expectations and TensorFlow Data Validation define assertions on data properties.

twist.text: Distribution shifts are subtle: the mean stays the same but the variance doubles.

climax.text: Run validation at ingestion, before training, and before serving. Three checkpoints minimum.

punchline.text: Validate early. Fail fast. Save GPU hours.

quiz.question: When should data validation run?
options: At ingestion, before training, and before serving
